mapper.update: CREATE TABLE `kss_soft_key` ( `id` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `adminid` smallint(5) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `keysetid` smallint(5) NOT NULL, `cdkey` char(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `ordernum` char(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `cday` decimal(8,2) NOT NULL, `tag` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `addtime` datetime NOT NULL, `usedtime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `userid` int(10) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL, `oldcday` decimal(8,2) DEFAULT NULL, `newcday` decimal(8,2) DEFAULT NULL, `status` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ACTIVE', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `cdkey` (`cdkey`), KEY `adminid` (`adminid`), KEY `keysetid` (`keysetid`), KEY `ordernum` (`ordernum`(10)), KEY `tag` (`tag`(10)), KEY `userid` (`userid`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `kss_soft_user` ( `id` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `adminid` smallint(5) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `username` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `password` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `cday` decimal(8,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `tag` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `linecode` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `pccode` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `addtime` datetime NOT NULL, `endtime` datetime NOT NULL, `lastlogintime` datetime NOT NULL, `lastloginip` bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `rechargetimes` int(5) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `status` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ACTIVE', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `username` (`username`(10)), KEY `adminid` (`adminid`), KEY `tag` (`tag`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
